page.title: 06STUDLAND ACCOMMODATION
page.content: A group of children visited the local hotels and guest houses to judge the range of accommodation available.These included one large *** hotel,two pubs and various small family businesses. The prices ranged from{Â£7.50 to Â£20 {for basic Bed and Breakfast.}Only two were open all year.The rest opened only for "the Season".All catered for a wide age range and drew their guests from all parts of Britain. Few of the smaller guest houses were offering services other than basic food and lodging.(One offered to Baby-Sit!) The larger hotel provided Golf,Dancing,Tennis,Swimming and pleasant gardens.The smaller hotel had tennis courts.There are Riding Stables in the village.Some villagers are turning to the less time-consuming use of their premises as{"Self {-Catering Holiday Flats".
